column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This time I tried the smalls plates: the Caramalized Cauliflower and the Crispy Chicken. The Cauliflower was nothing special
column2: I could have made this at home
column3: and it was a little bland
column4: not worth the $4 in my opinion. The Crispy Chicken
column6: I would definitely get this again. Huge chunks of tender and fried
column7: dark meat chicken. VERY GOOD. I recommend!
